Not ‚ÄúF# Tools for Visual Studio Express 2012 for Web‚Äù
It comes with SQL Express LocalDB Edition
You‚Äôll get it all‚Ä¶but it will
Small installer. The 32-bit version has 28.2 MB and the 64-bit version has 33.7 .
Simplified Installation. It does do not require configuration or administration.
Run as a low privileged user.
Offers the same T-SQL language as SQL Server Express. It supports stored procedures,  geometry and geography data types, triggers, views.
LocalDB uses the same sqlservr.exe as other editions of SQL Server and the same client-side providers.
LocalDB doesn't create any database services; LocalDB processes are started and stopped automatically when needed.

LocalDB connections support AttachDbFileName property, which allows developers to specify a database file location (if desired)
One LocalDB installation for all users on a computer.
Familiar to developers using SQL Server Compact.
It works with ASP.NET
It supports XML (XQuery, XPath) and BLOB.
It supports ADO .NET Sync Framework
It supports LINQ.
It supports distributed transactions.
Unlimited local connections.
Create a free GitHub account* if you don‚Äôt have one yet
You‚Äôll use it in a little bit‚Ä¶
Seriously, it‚Äôs not as bad as it might sound
An easy-to-use, free* GUI for Git
If you installed msysgit, it should pre-fill this line
Recommend using your GitHub account information‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶but your real GitHub account goes on the next screen‚Ä¶
You‚Äôre making a duplicate copy of your Forked Rock repository (origin) to your local system
Then wait while the data is pulled from the origin repo‚Ä¶
If selected, unchanged files will be shown
Following the gitflow* model, we‚Äôre developing in the ‚Äúdevelop‚Äù branch
Go fetch a VS Product key ÔÅå
If you see this‚Ä¶ just press OK
* You won‚Äôt be monkeying with the Rock Scheduler Service anyhow.

If using other SQL, then use:

You‚Äôll learn more about Git during an RC session this week
Pull Requests (in GitHub) ‚Äì a way to submit your valuable, cool code to the core team

notes.slide-28: Make sure the Default project is set to ‚ÄúRock‚Äù
notes.slide-29: Add New Item under your RockWeb project
notes.slide-3: When it installs SQL Server Express leave the default ‚ÄúMixed Mode Authentication‚Äù and select a good SA password (don‚Äôt forget it).
